tools.name: LB-t
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-threaded object-oriented LBM CFD solver for 3D incompressible flows
tools.detailed_description: A computational fluid dynamics code implementing the Lattice-Boltzmann method (LBM) for three-dimensional incompressible fluid flow. It supports general lattices (D2Q9, D3Q15, etc.) and is written in C++17 with OpenMP parallelization.

tools.name: PeleC
tools.one_line_profile: AMR code for compressible reacting flow simulations
tools.detailed_description: An adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) solver for compressible reacting flows, built on the AMReX framework. It is designed for high-performance simulations of combustion and compressible fluid dynamics.

tools.name: CAMR
tools.one_line_profile: AMR code for compressible flow simulation
tools.detailed_description: A compressible flow solver utilizing adaptive mesh refinement (AMR), part of the AMReX-Fluids ecosystem. It serves as a core component for simulating compressible fluid dynamics phenomena.

tools.name: IAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel AMR code for variable-density incompressible Navier-Stokes equations
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) code that solves the variable-density incompressible Navier-Stokes equations. It is built on the AMReX framework and is suitable for large-scale fluid simulations.

tools.name: incflo
tools.one_line_profile: Incompressible Navier-Stokes solver for complex geometries
tools.detailed_description: An incompressible Navier-Stokes solver designed for complex geometries, leveraging the AMReX framework for adaptive mesh refinement. It is often used in coupled multi-physics simulations.

tools.name: Basilisk (Astrodynamics)
tools.one_line_profile: Astrodynamics simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: A modular and fast astrodynamics simulation framework capable of simulating complex spacecraft dynamics and control systems. Note: This is distinct from the CFD solver also named Basilisk.

tools.name: bsk_rl
tools.one_line_profile: RL environments and tools for spacecraft autonomy research
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Reinforcement Learning (RL) environments and tools for spacecraft autonomy research, built on top of the Basilisk astrodynamics framework.

tools.name: DLBFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic load balancing model for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An open-source dynamic load balancing library for OpenFOAM, specifically optimized for fast reacting flow simulations with uneven computational loads.

tools.name: AMR-LBM-OpenMP-2D
tools.one_line_profile: AMR-LBM solver for multiphase flows
tools.detailed_description: A numerical simulation tool utilizing the Lattice-Boltzmann Method (LBM) with Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) for multiphase flows, parallelized with OpenMP.

tools.name: Improved_Phase-Field_LBM_2D
tools.one_line_profile: Improved conservative phase-field LBM code for multiphase flows
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran implementation of an improved conservative phase-field Lattice Boltzmann Method for simulating multiphase flows in 2D periodic domains.

tools.name: flowTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis and reduced-order modeling of fluid flows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis and reduced-order modeling (ROM) of fluid flow data, integrating with PyTorch for machine learning applications in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: Omega2D

tools.detailed_description: A two-dimensional fluid flow solver featuring a GUI, utilizing vortex particle methods and boundary element methods for simulation.

tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, differentiable Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) solver implemented in JAX, designed for physics-based machine learning and inverse design problems.

tools.name: VISCOPLASTIC-LBM

tools.name: PIHM
tools.one_line_profile: Penn State Integrated Hydrologic Model
tools.detailed_description: A fully coupled multiprocess hydrologic model that uses a semi-discrete finite volume approach to simulate hydrology, including surface and subsurface flows.

tools.name: euler2d_kokkos
tools.one_line_profile: 2D Euler solver using Kokkos for performance portability
tools.detailed_description: A finite volume solver for the 2D Euler equations implemented using the Kokkos library, serving as a research prototype for performance-portable CFD on HPC architectures.

tools.name: CreateFFD
tools.one_line_profile: Free-Form Deformation box generator for SU2
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool from Pointwise to generate Free-Form Deformation (FFD) boxes compatible with the SU2 CFD solver, aiding in shape optimization workflows.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-preCICE Adapter
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling adapter connecting OpenFOAM to preCICE
tools.detailed_description: An adapter that allows OpenFOAM solvers to be coupled with other simulation codes via the preCICE coupling library for multiphysics simulations.

tools.name: preCICE
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling library for partitioned multi-physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance coupling library for partitioned multi-physics simulations (e.g., fluid-structure interaction), enabling black-box coupling of existing solvers.

tools.name: SU2-preCICE Adapter
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling adapter connecting SU2 to preCICE
tools.detailed_description: An adapter enabling the SU2 CFD solver to participate in partitioned multiphysics simulations via the preCICE coupling library.

tools.name: CFDTool
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB CFD simulation toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox providing a GUI and integrated environment for running CFD simulations, supporting built-in solvers as well as OpenFOAM and SU2.

tools.name: FEATool Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB Multiphysics simulation toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A fully integrated physics simulation platform for MATLAB, supporting FEA and CFD with interfaces to FEniCS, OpenFOAM, and SU2.

tools.name: PyCLES
tools.one_line_profile: Python infrastructure for Cloud Large Eddy Simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based infrastructure for running Large Eddy Simulations (LES) of clouds and atmospheric boundary layers, designed for flexibility and ease of use.

tools.name: Fluid2d
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile Python-Fortran CFD code for solving 2D flows
tools.detailed_description: A computational fluid dynamics solver combining Python and Fortran to simulate a large class of 2D flow problems, designed for research and educational versatility.

tools.name: pylbm
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) solver framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for numerical simulations using the Lattice Boltzmann Method, allowing easy definition of geometry and schemes for fluid dynamics problems.

tools.name: PySPH
tools.one_line_profile: Open source framework for Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework for Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) simulations, supporting parallel execution and various SPH schemes for fluid and solid mechanics.

tools.name: thermocapillaryInterFoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM solver for thermocapillary and multiphase flows
tools.detailed_description: A Volume-of-Fluid (VoF) based multiphase solver for OpenFOAM, extended to include heat transfer, Marangoni flow, and laser interaction for complex surface-tension driven flows.

tools.name: Cfd
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Fluid Dynamics workbench for FreeCAD
tools.detailed_description: A FreeCAD workbench that integrates OpenFOAM and Fenics solvers to perform Computational Fluid Dynamics simulations directly within the CAD environment.

tools.name: BouncingDroplets
tools.one_line_profile: DNS code for drop impact in inertio-capillary regime
tools.detailed_description: Direct numerical simulation infrastructure for modeling drop impact onto liquid pools, developed in collaboration with the Harris Lab at Brown University.

tools.name: DropImpactViscousPool
tools.one_line_profile: DNS code for drop impact onto viscous pools
tools.detailed_description: Direct numerical simulation code for studying the impact of drops onto pools of different liquids, developed with the Oxford Fluids Lab.

tools.name: Sailfish
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated Lattice Boltzmann Method solver
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) simulation package designed for GPUs, supporting CUDA and OpenCL for fluid dynamics research.

tools.name: OpenHyperFLOW2D
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel CFD code for compressible reacting flows
tools.detailed_description: A research and educational CFD code supporting parallel execution (MPI/OpenMP/CUDA) for simulating 2D transient viscous compressible multicomponent reacting gas flows.

tools.name: CFDEMInterFoamIB
tools.one_line_profile: CFDEM solver for fluid-granular interaction
tools.detailed_description: A solver based on CFDEM coupling to simulate the interaction between two-phase fluids and granular materials using Immersed Boundary methods.

tools.name: listLBM
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Lattice Boltzmann solver for porous media
tools.detailed_description: A sparse Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) solver optimized for simulating multiphase flow in porous media.

tools.name: spectralDNS
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Navier-Stokes solvers in Python
tools.detailed_description: A suite of spectral solvers for the Navier-Stokes equations and related fluid dynamics problems, implemented in Python for high-accuracy direct numerical simulation.

tools.name: HTR-solver
tools.one_line_profile: Task-based high-order Navier-Stokes solver for hypersonic flows
tools.detailed_description: A solver for the Navier-Stokes equations at hypersonic Mach numbers, featuring finite-rate chemistry for dissociating air and multicomponent transport, designed for high-performance computing.

tools.name: ICSFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Density-based CFD solver library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library for Implicit Coupled Simulations in OpenFOAM, providing a density-based CFD solver optimized for high-speed flow simulations.

tools.name: SU2 MeshTools
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh manipulation and generation tools for SU2
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities for handling mesh files specifically designed to work within the SU2 simulation suite ecosystem.

tools.name: SU2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source suite for multiphysics simulation and design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) and performing PDE-constrained optimization problems, widely used for CFD and aerodynamic shape design.

tools.name: blastfoam
tools.one_line_profile: Compressible flow solver for high-explosive detonation
tools.detailed_description: A CFD solver based on OpenFOAM for simulating multi-component compressible flows, specifically tailored for high-explosive detonation, air blast, and explosive safety applications.

tools.name: Deep-Flow-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for RANS flow predictions
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing deep learning techniques to predict fluid flow fields (Reynolds-averaged Navier Stokes) around objects, enabling accelerated CFD inference.

tools.name: libWallModelledLES
tools.one_line_profile: Wall-modelled Large-Eddy Simulation library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library extension for OpenFOAM that implements wall-modeling capabilities for Large-Eddy Simulations (LES), enabling efficient simulation of high Reynolds number flows.

tools.name: sarracen
tools.one_line_profile: SPH analysis and visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library based on Matplotlib and NumPy for analyzing and visualizing Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) data, supporting various SPH codes.

tools.name: JAX-SPH
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable SPH framework using JAX
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) framework built on JAX, enabling gradient-based optimization and machine learning integration for fluid simulations.

tools.name: turbinesFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Actuator line modeling library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An extension library for OpenFOAM that implements actuator line modeling, specifically designed for simulating wind turbines and wake interactions.

tools.name: uDALES
tools.one_line_profile: Large-eddy simulation for urban flow and microclimate
tools.detailed_description: A large-eddy simulation (LES) software designed for modelling urban flow, dispersion, and microclimates, handling complex urban geometries and thermal exchanges.

tools.name: UCLALES
tools.one_line_profile: LES code for atmospheric boundary layer flows
tools.detailed_description: A Large Eddy Simulation (LES) code specifically developed for simulating atmospheric boundary layer flows, clouds, and climate interactions.

tools.name: UCNS3D
tools.one_line_profile: Unstructured Compressible Navier-Stokes 3D solver
tools.detailed_description: A high-order, unstructured, compressible Navier-Stokes solver designed for complex 3D aerodynamic flows and turbulence simulation.

tools.name: hybridCentralSolvers
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of hybrid central solvers for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A suite of hybrid central solvers for OpenFOAM, including one-phase, two-phase, and multicomponent versions, designed for compressible and shock-capturing flows.

tools.name: libAcoustics
tools.one_line_profile: Far-field noise computation library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM library for computing far-field noise from CFD data using the Ffowcs Williams-Hawkings (FW-H) analogy.

tools.name: libcompressibleTools
tools.one_line_profile: Compressible flow utility library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A utility library for OpenFOAM containing boundary conditions, linear solvers, and function objects specifically for compressible flow calculations.

tools.name: DRLinFluids
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for coupling Deep Reinforcement Learning with OpenFOAM for flow control
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python platform that facilitates the coupling of deep reinforcement learning (DRL) algorithms with OpenFOAM CFD simulations. It allows for the development and testing of AI-driven flow control strategies within complex fluid dynamics environments.

tools.name: pinn4hcf
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural networks for highly compressible flow simulations
tools.detailed_description: A research code and tool implementing Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) specifically tailored for solving highly compressible fluid flow problems, integrating deep learning with fluid physics.

tools.name: wlb
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice-Boltzmann method solver for fluid dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the Lattice-Boltzmann method (LBM) for simulating fluid dynamics, providing a computational framework for solving fluid flow problems using mesoscopic kinetic equations.

tools.name: pdfFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Transported JPDF library and solver for reactive flows in OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library and solver extension for OpenFOAM that implements transported Joint Probability Density Function (JPDF) methods for high-fidelity simulation of turbulent reactive flows.

tools.name: openLBMflow
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Lattice Boltzmann solver for fluid flow
tools.detailed_description: A compact and efficient open-source solver based on the Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) for simulating 2D and 3D fluid flows, designed for portability and ease of use.

tools.name: DCGrid
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive grid structure for GPU-based fluid simulation
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing a dynamic adaptive grid structure optimized for memory-constrained fluid simulations on GPUs, enabling efficient high-resolution CFD computations.

tools.name: Incompact3d
tools.one_line_profile: High-order finite-difference flow solver for massive parallelization
tools.detailed_description: A high-fidelity CFD solver dedicated to Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) and Large Eddy Simulation (LES) of turbulent flows, using high-order compact finite-difference schemes and designed for massive parallel computing.

tools.name: X3D2
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation high-fidelity CFD solver from XCompact3d
tools.detailed_description: The next-generation development version of the high-fidelity CFD solver framework from the XCompact3d project, targeting advanced turbulence simulations.

tools.name: sediFoam
tools.one_line_profile: CFD-DEM solver for sediment transport
tools.detailed_description: A coupled CFD-DEM (Computational Fluid Dynamics - Discrete Element Method) solver built on OpenFOAM and LAMMPS, specifically designed for simulating particle-laden flows and sediment transport processes.

tools.name: ofpp
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM Python Parser for data conversion
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to parse OpenFOAM output files (fields, meshes) directly into Numpy arrays, facilitating data analysis and post-processing of CFD results in Python environments.

tools.name: OpenLBM
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice Boltzmann Method solver with BGK and MRT collision models
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) solver implementation supporting BGK and MRT collision operators for simulating fluid dynamics problems.

tools.name: dugksFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Discrete Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme solver for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM-based solver implementing the Discrete Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme (DUGKS) for multiscale flow simulations, bridging continuum and rarefied flow regimes.

tools.name: fvLBM
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Volume Lattice Boltzmann Method solver
tools.detailed_description: A solver implementing the Finite Volume Lattice Boltzmann Method (FV-LBM), combining the kinetic theory of LBM with the geometric flexibility of finite volume methods for CFD.

tools.name: zoziha-sph
tools.one_line_profile: Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based implementation of the Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) method for meshless fluid simulation.
